title: Empath

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player. If they are hanged the following day, you become Grief-struck.
- At night, if you're Grief-struck, instead choose a player to Curse.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You appear innocent until Grief-struck
- While Grief-struck, you Curse all your visitors each night
- You know who's Cursed
- All Cursed players are framed as the same role of your choice. You cannot individually choose each player's framed role.
- If all players who oppose you are Cursed, they all die and you win.
- If you are hanged, two random Cursed players who voted for you immediately die.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Kill everyone who opposes the Peasants.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4551
*The boy spat out hot tears that ran down his face. Every member of his rowing team was like a blood-brother to him; they trained together, ate together, and when time came, they went to war together. He had someone to blame, but one man was not enough; he cursed the man in a gray uniform on the opposite side of the field, the gun which had barked so indignantly, the bullet which lodged in the cracked earth just a few meters away - he would curse the whole world until it ignited in flames and burned up.*
